entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Initial version for resolver for supporting DataContract and DataMember attributes in System.Text.Json #75226
  • Stream.ReadAtLeastAsync and ReadExactlyAsync read an unknown number of bytes when cancelled, no way to recover #75225
  • Vxsort on Windows x64 accessing past the end of the buffer on some runtime tests #75224
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests` are broken on `main` #75223
  • JIT: check/release diff in arm SPMI libraries_tests.pmi #75221
  • Tar: Not able to write a PaxTarEntry from a TarReader. #75215
    7.0.0
  • Out of bounds array access in GC #75214
    7.0.0
  • Repeated commits for mark array #75207
    8.0.0
  • Codegen difference: Local vs IL Stack #75206
    Future
  • why there is lot differences in download speed between framework and dotnet #75203
  • Port redundant warning suppression detection from ILLink to NativeAOT #75201
    8.0.0
  • NO_PROXY: consider matching curl behavior #75199
  • HttpClient - provide timeout per read/write operation in async methods #75188
    Future
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AcceptConnectionFailed #75184
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Some of the System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_XmlResolver tests get stuck on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75183
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777\\GitHub_17777.cmd #75177
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding more IndexOf variations #75175
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Half ToString() bug #75204
  • cgrpoups v2 for dotnet 3.1 #75180
  • Strings with embedded nulls cause issues with event payload decoding #52025
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: password bytes PKCS8 PEM exports #74085
    8.0.0
  • [ThreadPool] OOM during gate thread creation and worker thread creation could stall the thread pool #13437
    8.0.0
  • Fails Reflection to System.Private.CoreLib at Generic method on IIS #75103
  • Test failure: Interop/ObjectiveC/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI/ObjectiveCMarshalAPI.sh #74130
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient: An asterisk for wildcards in NO_PROXY is not handled properly #61840
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient Response Stream hangs #74568
    8.0.0
  • Orphaned ReaderWriterLockSlim #12107
    Future
  • Clean up threading tests to make them deterministic and not rely on timing #10420
    Future
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync rethrowing exceptions #75115
    7.0.0
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found #75062
    Future
  • Add constructor with string for SocketException #69266
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory+ExtendedSocketException #37150
    Future
  • Linq IntersectBy() just returns first item on same keySelector #75066
  • [wasm] 'Undefined symbol: arc4random' building Blazor WASM with libsodium #74352
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #74732
    7.0.0
  • UriBuilder should percent-encode its UserName or Password properties #74662
    Future
  • Add more entropy to GetTempFileName() on Windows #73793
    8.0.0
  • Race condition in `DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash` #75041
    7.0.0
  • JIT: morph late canonicalization of assign foils local assertion prop #12098
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish assets immediately and clean some vars #75222
  • Fix the definition of IResourceManagerFactory2. #75219
    area-System.Transactions
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unreferenced cryptographic files #75216
    area-System.Security
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-enable WBT SIMD test on v8, and node #75210
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable Linux/arm and Linux/arm64 JIT rolling builds #75209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update namespace of JsonPolymorphismOptionsTests #75205
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Add new workloads for net8.0 #75200
    area-Build-mono
  • [Android] Avoid using OffsetDateTime on APIs 25 and lower #75196
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75193
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #75192
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix NodeJS build #75187
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Set name .NET SigHandler #75185
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Sample running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #75179
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, blocked, 7.0.0
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75176
    area-System.Transactions
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a perf pipeline issue #75173
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #75172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Remove wbt manifest hack #75197
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove SuperPMI collection of PMI of coreclr tests #75211
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • dummy commit to runtime-extra-platforms.yml to kick the scheduling en… #75217
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make special_sweep_p a per heap member #74625
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Stage spmi aspnet collection through the repo artifacts dir #74879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Ignoring all protocol extension messages that are not supported on .net6 #74836
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.10
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74383
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74366
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #74188
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.x
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places in System.Reflection.Metadata #75135
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of CoreCLR test run #74961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix race condition in DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash #75178
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Support multiple processor groups for NativeAOT #75174
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn compiler build #75156
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #75145
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Disable the GetTotalPauseDuration test #75141
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement TryExportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKeyPem with byte passwords #75161
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid gate/worker thread creation failure stall the thread pool #74791
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix issue with pip install on Alpine #75143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] SIMD related build fixes #75042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Rename `$(WasmSIMD)`, and `$(WasmExceptionHandling)` to `$(WasmEnable*)` #75153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2 for LA64. #75118
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark allocating function in finalizer test as NoInlining #75189
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 6.0.10 #75146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use swizzle instruction for byte vectors #75182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add more vector measurements #75186
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75162
    area-Build-mono
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Make OP_WASM_SIMD_SWIZZLE use the shufflevector LLVM ins… #75057
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix race condition in DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash #75099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support multiple processor groups for NativeAOT #75165
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes instead of open-coded loop in CreateSecKeyAndSecWebSocketAccept #75130
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • [release/7.0][wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 cross containers to ones including pip3 #75167
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Tar: Fix buffer is too small error when writing Prefix on large filenames #75023
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: local assertion prop and redundant zeroing #74967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Drop 6.0.200 workload manifests #74595
    blocked, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add CI job for AOT+SIMD to `runtime-wasm` for PRs #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude segment_standby_list from regions #74975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify installer build by using step container targets #75011
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #75159
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump LLVM to unversioned OSX package names #74996
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [wasm-mt] Fix failing System.Xml tests on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75124
    area-System.Xml
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert "Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. (#74749)"" #75163
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test sometimes hangs in a VM #27737
  • Automatically create a local tool-manifest when a tool is installed and no manifest exists #27736
    8.0.1xx
  • Failure to find package StyleCop.Analyzers while building source-build #27735

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Jab dependency #27742
  • removed extra EnableAnalyzers props #27740
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix test to match runtime changes #27739
    Area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Do not sign test packages #27707
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27719
    Area-Compatibility
  • Retarget MSBuildSDKResolver #27714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27710
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove timeout, reenable ProjectReferences_Graph test #27657
    Area-Watch
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1986545 #27667
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog
  • Champion: Switch expression as a statement expression #2632
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Enhanced switch statements #3038
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Ignored Directives Support #3507
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: #pragma warning *enable* #3986
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Champion "Permit IEnumerable<T> as the type of a params parameter" #179
    Backlog
  • Champion "Null-conditional await" #35
    Any Time
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #6382

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref escape analysis errors are not reported for compound assignment #63852
  • Convert To Record Improvements #63849
  • Address feedback on "File types EE support" #63847
    17.4
  • [LSP] Missing export for project contexts in TS #63844
  • LSIF Generation requires "free range" tracking resulting in heavy memory overhead for larger projects #63842
  • LSIF generation uses inVs on invalid nodes #63841
  • LSIF generation can't be interpreted by 0.6.0 validators #63840
  • Unused Variable Analysis Does Not Account for Local Function Default Parameter Values #63837
    Backlog
  • CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryServiceFactory+CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryService+RecoverableSyntaxTree.WithRootAndOptions does not preserve the Encoding property #63834
    17.4

Closed

  • Convert To Record Timeline #63137
    17.4
  • [Regression] "Rename symbol's file" option gets forgotten #63810
    17.4
  • Improve error recovery for use of 'ref readonly' instead of 'in' #63758
    Backlog
  • [Flaky test] GoToImplementationOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotOpen #60071
    17.4
  • Issue with error CS0114 and CS0109 #63821
    17.4
  • StringCopyPaste test phyically write to the clipboard causing flakyness #61764
    Backlog
  • `Convert to raw string` refactoring is available for incompatible C# versions #63592
    17.4
  • "Preview referenced changes" on Change Signature dialog doesn't preview changes #63831
  • Source Generators incompatible with .Net7 #63806
  • [LSP] Semantic classification does not work in the interactive window #63148
    17.4
  • Experimental C# LSP Completions committed with overtypeable characters don't overtype #55187
    17.3
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens flickering #61239
  • Pressing 'enter' in a single-line raw-string-literal should convert it to multi-line. #59835
    17.3
  • CI build fails due to Azure package feed error 503 (Service Unavailable) #57565
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens slow to colorize when typing #61393
    Backlog
  • Compiler lacks ways to get to the built-in operator methods it synthesizes from the semantic model #63186
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update tests to assert different behavior on .net core #63851
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert to Record (Non-positional) #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63843
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Stop performing LOC on 17.3 branch and start localizing 17.4. #63839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers
  • Give a specific error when a file type is duplicated in the same file #63829
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Extract out diagnostic sources into their own files #63846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern #63817
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify FSA computation of workspace diagnostics in LSP #63845
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not go back from Solution instance to Workspace #63836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix rename file option so it only updates with user changes #63827
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Restore live update behavior in new inline rename #63783
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Better error recovery when 'readonly' is used as a parameter modifier #63777
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [BULK] DocuTune - Fix build validation issues: docs-link-absolute #63791
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Get pipelineid from env vars #63785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers
  • Propagate EffectiveScope to parameters of anonymous delegate types. #63787
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Build only test projects and split out building TFMs into separate queues #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `FromFormAttribute.Name` not respected by `ApiParameterDescription.Name` #43815

  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, https, mvc #43805

  • Question - Blazor - Why is a rethrown exception not causing the developer exception stack trace page to be shown? #43800
  • Question - Blazor - Best way to narrowly scope ErrorBoundary #43798
  • How to handle route values in IApplicationModelConvention #43797
  • Accepts Extension method for null Content-Type in Minimal API #43794
  • Cannot get endpoint metadata from `IApiDescriptionGroupCollectionProvider` which added by `MapXXX().Add(...)` #43792
  • OutputCaching + YARP interoperability #43791
  • Hosting bundle gets updated with OS upgrades causing issue. #43790

Closed

  • Multiple ASP.NET Core OAuth Correlation cookies #42740

  • Make RateLimiterMiddleware endpoint-aware #41667

  • StaticFiles assets not found in ASP.NET Core MVC With RCL #43796

Merged

    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Avoid client result invocation ID collisions #43716
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Add default error response to gRPC transcoding #43768
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2

  • [6.0] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VisualElement.HeightRequest defaults to 0 instead of -1 when using OnIdom default value #9978

  • Fix Visual Test Runner so that it will split up tests that use class based test cases #9976

    Backlog
  • Image "AspectFit" not centered #9971
    Backlog
  • [MAC] Horizontal Options of child inside absolute layout is not working with "RightToLeft' flow direction #9970
    Backlog
  • Image wrong rotation with a ContentView and BindableProperty #9969
    Backlog
  • Collectionview selectedItemChanged event causes framework error on android #9964

  • HideKeyboard #3850

  • Centered StackLayout within StackLayout does not center #9927

  • System.NullReferenceException in ShellToolbarTracker.cs:581 when opening the app via notification tray #9090
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor .NET MUAI] Not all CSS cursor properties are functional #9960
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo does not work [Windows11, Android11/12, iOS not tested] dotnet --version: 6.0.400 #9920
  • VoiceOver is reading invisible control. #8754
    7.0-rc1
  • Voiceover reading button for "Click here to View full recipe" link. #5816
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Data Binding not working #9932

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, high
  • Correctly layout the WebView #9923

  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Don't Propagate Command Mappers when Android View is Disposed of #9956

Updated

  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    7.0-rc2
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending Core xml comments #9950
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Slider ThumbImage size #8760
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GroupBy owned entity #29018
  • Perform code cleanup before 8.0.0 GA release #29017
  • Move issues from 8.0.0 preview milestones to 8.0.0 after GA #29016
  • Add Migration fails due to pre-existing migration with same name even though using separate MigrationHistory tables for multiple DbContexts in same database #29015
  • Expand navigations on grouping key #29014
  • GroupBy entity subquery #29013
  • GroupBy JSON Entity #29011
  • Filtered include, and then include related entity loses the filter? #29010
  • ChangeTracker.DetectChanges() issue with DDD-style enumerations #29008
  • Column order not scaffolded as attribute #29007
  • Constant value handling in ExpressionEqualityComparer #29006

Closed

  • Entity Equality: support GroupBy #15938
  • Fix bugs with rows affected and value propagation for sprocs #28997
    7.0.0
  • Discussion on using EF Core in an interactive C# Jupyter notebook #23540
    7.0.0
  • Linq expression containing Array Object isn't cached and compiled every time #28581
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Disposing DbContext scoped to a Razor component lifetime throws InvalidOperationException on quick refreshes #25291
  • ConcurrencyCheck support only valid when in update column #28909
  • Owned Types get attached multiple times as different types #26257
    7.0.0
  • InMemory provider deletes wrong entry when DELETE and ADD for same PK #25905
    7.0.0
  • Migrations: Is there a way to inline the CREATE INDEX statement in the CREATE TABLE statement? #28992
  • a question about DbContext's Lifetime #28951
  • Seeding no longer takes max batch size into account #28876
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Support for GroupBy entity type #29019
  • Code cleanup #29012
  • [release/6.0] Clear reference to DbDataReader from RelationalDataReader #29005

Merged

  • Fix bugs with rows affected and value propagation for sprocs #29009
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29002
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29001
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Test for entity type with navigation mapped to SqlQuery #28990
  • Cosmos: Stop attempting to include navigations not defined for the concrete type being materialized #28987
  • Delete correct shared-key entity with in-memory provider #28979
  • Perform structural equality in ExpressionEqualityComparer #28720
  • Clear reference to DbDataReader from RelationalDataReader #28989
  • Take min/max batch size into account again for seeding #28955

Updated

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
    blocked
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908
  • Query: Allow EF.Default for value types #28973
    blocked
  • Query: Change JSONQuery.Path to be list of PathSegment #28888
  • [release/7.0] In-build signing for release branches #28994
  • feat: normalize migrations file #28367
  • Fix for including collection entity which contains JSON #28974
  • Query: Convert unflattened GroupJoin to correlated subquery #28998
